description: Details required by condition 4(Green Travel Plan) of Planning Permission 18/12596/FUL (Demolition of the existing two storey teaching block (1970s) and erection of new attached two-storey (replacement) building providing for an additional 60 students (2 new classes))
decision_conditions: That the applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that the condition, as noted above, is fully discharged.
Notwithstanding the submitted information, please ensure that the travel plan is TFL STARS Bronze accredited within one year of commencement of works.

Your attention is drawn to the need to comply with the relevant provisions of the Building Regulations, the Building Acts and other related legislation. These cover such works as - the demolition of existing buildings, the erection of a new building or structure, the extension or alteration to a building, change of use of buildings, installation of services, underpinning works, and fire safety/means of escape works. Notice of intention to demolish existing buildings must be given to the Council's Building Control Service at least 6 weeks before work starts. A completed application form together with detailed plans must be submitted for approval before any building work is commenced.

Reasonable efforts have been made to check that the plans submitted for the purposes of this planning application are consistent from one to the next, and that the development hereby approved can be implemented in accordance with all of the plans submitted. Should it transpire that this is not possible and that your plans are flawed, please be clear that it may be impossible to implement this permission, and that any development undertaken which relies on this permission may be unauthorised and subject to enforcement action.

As we are unable to accept your email to amend the application description, as this will be going out to public consultation, and your submitted form will be seen, a new application form is attached to this email for you to complete and return, in order to validate your application

Please provide a copy of block plan scaled 1:500 showing the proposed works (hatched or shaded) in relation to the existing dwelling, site boundaries and any outbuildings on site.  The block plan should also show adjoining properties to the side and rear and those opposite in full outline. Kindly ensure the full application site is highlighted in red and not just the extension
